Working with email in the mode that enables quick response, encourages effective workflow, facilitates elaboration and tracking is one of the primaries of a service provider.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Following TI Service Team experience there could be highlighted several primary rules that are helpful for each team member. Below you can find a detailed step-by-step guide on how to create these rules.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"So, open your Outlook and just follow the instruction:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.
